article.title: Lockheed to Support United Arab Emirates PAC-3 Control System
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Corporation, Grand Prairie, Texas, was awarded more than $17 million for the integration support of post deployment build-7 software in the United Arab Emirates Patriot Advanced Capability-3 Ground System Engagement Control System.Â U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
